verses.verse: And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> stand <WH5975> upon <WH5921> thy feet, <WH7272> and I will speak <WH1696> unto thee.

And the spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> into me when <WH834> he spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> me, and set <WH5975> me upon <WH5921> my feet, <WH7272> that I heard <WH8085> <WH853> him that spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> me.

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> I <WH589> send <WH7971> thee <WH853> to <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> to <WH413> a rebellious <WH4775> nation <WH1471> that <WH834> hath rebelled <WH4775> against me: they <WH1992> and their fathers <WH1> have transgressed <WH6586> against me, even unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> very <WH6106> day. <WH3117>

For they are impudent <WH7186> <WH6440> children <WH1121> and stiffhearted. <WH2389> <WH3820> I <WH589> do send <WH7971> thee unto <WH413> them; and thou shalt say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

And they, <WH1992> whether <WH518> they will hear, <WH8085> or whether <WH518> they will forbear, <WH2308> (for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are a rebellious <WH4805> house,) <WH1004> yet shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> there hath been <WH1961> a prophet <WH5030> among <WH8432> them.

And thou, <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> be not afraid <WH3372> <WH408> of <WH4480> them, neither <WH408> be afraid <WH3372> of their words, <WH4480> <WH1697> though <WH3588> briers <WH5621> and thorns <WH5544> be with <WH854> thee, and thou <WH859> dost dwell <WH3427> among <WH413> scorpions: <WH6137> be not afraid <WH3372> <WH408> of their words, <WH4480> <WH1697> nor <WH408> be dismayed <WH2865> at their looks, <WH4480> <WH6440> though <WH3588> they <WH1992> be a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>

And thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH853> my words <WH1697> unto <WH413> them, whether <WH518> they will hear, <WH8085> or whether <WH518> they will forbear: <WH2308> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are most rebellious. <WH4805>

But thou, <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> hear <WH8085> <WH853> what <WH834> I <WH589> say <WH1696> unto <WH413> thee; Be <WH1961> not <WH408> thou rebellious <WH4805> like that rebellious <WH4805> house: <WH1004> open <WH6475> thy mouth, <WH6310> and eat <WH398> <WH853> that <WH834> I <WH589> give <WH5414> <WH413> thee.
And when I looked, <WH7200> behold, <WH2009> a hand <WH3027> was sent <WH7971> unto <WH413> me; and, lo, <WH2009> a roll <WH4039> of a book <WH5612> was therein;

And he spread <WH6566> it before <WH6440> me; and it <WH1931> was written <WH3789> within <WH6440> and without: <WH268> and there was written <WH3789> therein <WH413> lamentations, <WH7015> and mourning, <WH1899> and woe. <WH1958>
